name: Three keyboard Vs mouse
description:
本游戏为2022年GIGA gamejam  开发武汉站第一名作品，主题为诡计

2022 CIGA GameJam Wuhan division champion,the theme is trick.

三键战鼠，是一个1V3非对称对抗游戏，是操作鼠标的大魔王玩家要使用各种诡计法术，在三分钟内耗尽操作键盘的三名勇者的生命次数，或是三名操作键盘的勇者识破各种诡计，耗尽鼠标大魔王的时间，获得胜利。

Baidu translation：

Three key warmouse is a 1v3 asymmetric confrontation game. The player of the great demon king who operates the mouse needs to use all kinds of tricks and spells to consume the lives of the three brave people who operate the keyboard in three minutes, or the three brave people who operate the keyboard can see through all kinds of tricks, exhaust the time of the great demon king of the mouse and win.
